description.P: A classifiication_select is a thing that is classified.
A complete_membership_select is a thing that is specified to be one of the members of an explicitly enumerated set.
A classification is a relationship between a class and a thing, that indicates the thing is a member of the class.
description.note: The meaning of this entity is identical to the entity classification defined in ISO 15926-2.

explicit.name: classifier
explicit.description: the class that has the classified as a member.

entity.name: Complete_membership
entity.description: A complete_membershipis a relationship that is between a class and an enumerated set of things that indicates the class contains each of the things and nothing else.

explicit.name: containing_set
explicit.description: the class that contains the members and nothing else.
